Articles.Content:
Hi, I recently upgraded to .23.5. However I upgraded before the hotfix and it nuked my career. I still have a quicksave. I can edit it probably, so is there anyway I can save my career? At all? I'm so sad and depressed and I almost feel as if I will never play KSP again. If you can fix it please please do I'm not very good with technical things...

Here is the file.

http://www./download/7ov0xi6ssoj8i56/quicksave.sfs

http://www./download/8k53ewam1kk73ja/persistent.sfs

(and the Nuked one.)

Please. Please. I'm litereally begging.
You may find this thread to be helpful Just substitute the quicksave for your old persistent.sfs in the instructions; the file structure is essentially the same.

Here, I went and made the proper edits to your quicksave: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-WrBQvLtYTub3RsNjFNLUpLVkU/edit?usp=sharing

Let me know if it works and I'll try again if I did it wrong
